metadata.description: Spells that control and move earth, stone, and metals

spells.name: The Unseen Arm
spells.description: Allows you to move a single metal object weighing up to 5 pounds as if with an invisible hand. The object moves slowly and carefully.

spells.name: Earth's Carbuncle
spells.description: Summons a fist-sized chunk of earth or stone from the ground to fly at a target. Does +5 damage as a ranged attack.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (move stone), +2 Voice, +2 for forceful movement causing damage

spells.name: Wielding the Invisible Sling
spells.description: Continuously hurls small stones at a target. Each round, the target takes +3 damage from flying stones.

spells.name: Hands of the Grasping Earth
spells.description: Causes the earth to grab and hold a target's feet and legs. The target cannot move and suffers -6 to physical actions.

spells.name: Pit of the Gaping Earth
spells.description: Opens a pit 10 feet deep directly beneath a target. The pit is 5 feet across and appears instantly.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (move earth), +2 Voice, +2 for creating large opening

spells.name: Wall of Protecting Stone
spells.description: Raises a stone wall 6 feet high and 20 feet long from the earth. The wall provides substantial cover and protection.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (move large amounts of stone), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +2 for complex shaping

spells.name: Levitate
spells.description: Causes a person wearing or touching metal to rise into the air and float. The target can move horizontally at walking speed.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (move metal supporting person), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration

spells.name: Calling the Odious Mineral
spells.description: Summons a specific type of metal or mineral from up to a mile away. The material travels through earth and stone to reach you.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (summon specific minerals), +2 Voice, +2 for long range

spells.name: Curse of the Unruly Tongue
spells.description: All metal objects on the target's person become difficult to control - weapons slip, armor binds, and tools malfunction.

spells.name: Parting the Earth
spells.description: Creates a passage through earth and stone up to 100 paces long. The passage is 6 feet wide and 8 feet tall.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (move massive amounts of earth), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +4 Boundary

spells.name: Fist of Shattering
spells.description: Causes a stone or metal object to violently shatter or break apart. Can destroy walls, weapons, or armor.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (destroy stone/metal), +2 Voice, +2 for violent destruction
